post.body: i do! p.s. how long will your 15 dollar button sale last? i want in but don't have time to design the button yet...
despite the typo that sounds DELISH!
oh liz! i took this for you- pic of my bro + family wearing your yarn! http://www.flickr.com/photos/rawfishdesigns/3161089511/
lol i've experienced that before! i figured a lil glitz won't kill me and drink my tea anyway, hehe :D
congrats! that is so cool!
oh you split your blogs??? that would be wayyy too much work for me. but maybe it will help you stay organized & get more clicks!
ahhhh good call!
that sounds like a nice way to spend the evening! i wish i was back to my fiber!! (i'm traveling right now)
ah i'm still ghetto blending mine! (literally in a blender) LOL
chickpeas are so cheap! i just make my own hummus! YUM
mmm what kinda tea?? pst i was over near by you for new years (sorta) by rogers park. did you wanna meet up for coffee sometime?
xmas pressie! only got 1 present & not actually there to open but i know it will be worth it once i get back to east coast!
i can't wait to get back to DE to play with my drum carder! looking at all your pretty batts is making me anxious!
new blog post! "ah the holidaze!" featuring all the handmade gifts i bought on etsy + links+ photos! http://rawfishcomics.blogspot.com/
just got back from seeing eagle eye at the $2 theater! definitely not worth paying the full price for but awesome for two bucks! hehe
i miss my spinning wheel... boo hoo
just got back from poking around the comic shop
nice pasta dinner cooked with jesse & nathan! trying to figure out what our new years plans are going to be. :D
i hate the dentist. i swear they invent new things every time you go. i'm tempted to stop going forever.
off to make some loose leaf teas to soothe my throat ache...
